properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 31 at 3:52PM CST until January 1 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a flood advisory for
the following rivers in middle Tennessee...

Duck River Near Hurricane Mills affecting Humphreys County

. The Duck River near Hurricane Mills has risen above action due to recent heavy
rainfall. The river should fall below action stage on Wednesday.

The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Duck River Near Hurricane Mills
* At 03PM Tuesday the stage was 16.0 feet and slowly rising.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 16.5 feet Wednesday morning.
* At 16.0 feet...Water begins to inundate agricultural land and other low lying
areas along the river including access points from Bucksnort to Taylortown,
Cedar Grove, and to Bakerville Rd.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to noaa weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
